response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think you'll really love it, and I'm willing to make a deal that benefits both of us. I'm offering it to you for $900,000. This is a great price, considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer and I look forward to hearing back from you.", "product_price": 900000}
